title: Edirne
summary: Edirne (US: /eɪˈdɪərnə, ɛˈ-/,[2][3] Turkish: [eˈdiɾne]), formerly Hadrianopolis (Greek: Αδριανούπολις), is a city in Turkey, in the northwestern part of the province of Edirne and Eastern Thrace, close to Turkey's borders with Greece and Bulgaria (3.24 miles or 5.22 kilometers from the Greek border at the closest point).[4]
